title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 344: Featuring Alex Killorn + Pat Maroon
description:
On Episode 344 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets the guys are joined by Stanley Cup Champions Pat Maroon and Alex Killorn of the Tampa Bay Lightning. The boys joined (01:07:43) to talk about the recent Cup run, Alex breaking his leg and Pat winning his third consecutive Stanley Cup. But first, the guys lead off the show diving into all the news across the league, including the Ryan Ellis trade to Philly, Gabriel Landeskog, and the Carey Price situation. The boys also touch on the protected/unprotected expansion roster list and some of the big names rumored to get scooped by Seattle. The fellas wrap up talking some Golf and about a quote from the NBA Finals.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
